name: Blocks io
description:
Touch the screen up, down, left or right to move your character and cover as much territory as possible. Make sure to guard your territory, If you or any other players touch your tale when you are out of your territory, you will be dead.

Touch the other player’s tail when they are out of their territory to destroy his area. Catch the diamonds to unlock all the funny characters.

Features:
* Play online or without internet connection (AI).
* Challenge other players around the world (Leather-board)
* Over 20 funny characters to play.
* Share your score on Facebook.
